attributes.title: Do not get
attributes.review: It took to long to download and when did took my phone information to help with his campaign

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: this app took 6 DAYS to download and it asked me for very pricey stuff while signing up. i would rate this a 0 if i could

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: This app is very racist, homophobic and sexist, it does not include all people and therefore should no longer be on the app store, just like the president, the app needs to go😌 thank u for ur time

attributes.title: IT STOLL ALL OF MY INFORMATION
attributes.review: I was opening this app when it immediately started stealing all of my data, corrupted my phone and the next day I got a charge for $500 from urban outfitters by a “unknown card.” DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
Just horrible everything from the app to the person

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!
attributes.review: Hi guys i would just like to say that Trump is a rapist and a racist and we shouldn’t have a president like that at ALL?!! This app took me 10 hours to load! i do not recommend! First of all i hate Trump🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️Omg he (Trump) snapped✨🧚‍♀️❤️✨🧚‍♀️NOW DO IT TO YOUR (Trump) NECK🤡🤡🤡👹👹👹

attributes.title: Where do I start
attributes.review: This app was bad mainly bc it was slow and depressing to have in my phone😌. Seeing Donald Trump kinda freaked me out and so for that reason I have to rate it poorly😢.

attributes.title: VERY MAD
attributes.review: After downloading the app i got bombarded with hateful messages and got spammed by spam-likely and I’m pretty sure my ip was leaked after downloading the app because a Karen that was wearing a trump flag as a cape ran on my toes and ate my chicken😡🤬 WHO IN TARNATIONS HAS THE GUTS TO TAKE MY CHICKEN?!

attributes.title: Trump2020
attributes.review: I really love that our president has his own app to keep his amazing followers up to date, he’s doing the lords work only he will make America great again,trump 2020!

attributes.title: Fake News and Terrible Quality!
attributes.review: Never have I ever experienced such a slow to respond app that is so disconnected from reality. Should be banned!
